9 funky Hammond organ classics

Freegal is our free music download and streaming service. Each month Richard Baker highlights some of the more unusual and obscure recordings. This month he casts his eye over some funky Hammond organ greats.

  • Putting on the Ritz by Joey DeFrancesco from The Street Of Dreams

  • Red Onion by Richard Holmes from New Groove

  • He’s A Mighty Good Leader by Lonnie Smith from Boogaloo to Beck by A Tribute

  • The Cat by Jimmy “The Cat” Smith from Portrait

  • Roll ‘em Pete by Rhoda Scott from Beyond The Sea

  • Soul Meeting by Billy Preston from Billy Preston

  • Ain’t It Funky Now by Jimmy McGriff from Groove Merchant Superfunk

  • Light Blues by Jack McDuff from The Jazz Collection

  • The Madison (Part 1) by Wild Bill Davis from The Ultimate Collection
